root.name: Time Crisis: Razing Storm
root.description: PlayStation 3 versionTime Crisis: Razing Storm for the PS3 is actually a bundle of 3 games; Time Crisis: Razing Storm, Time Crisis 4, and Deadstorm Pirates. All 3 games are playable using the PlayStation Move motion controller, the GunCon 3 (Which came with the original PS3 version of Time Crisis 4), or a regular DualShock 3 controller.
